name: Jirrik
content:
Jirrik was a male Chagrian ambassador residing on Vaiken Spacedock during the Galactic War.
Ambassador Jirrik is a vendor added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire in Update 4.0., who sells rewards from the Grand Acquisitions Race event. It is also possible to obtain a decoration version of Ambassador Jirrik, allowing people to place him in strongholds.
